summary: This document is a FOIA request submitted by attorneys from Boies Schiller Flexner LLP to the Executive Office for United States Attorneys, Department of Justice, seeking all records from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York related to investigations, complaints, or allegations involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, including materials related to Epstein's New York residence.

events.title: Submission of FOIA Request EOUSA-2019-003550
events.description: Attorneys from Boies Schiller Flexner LLP submit a FOIA request to the Executive Office for United States Attorneys, Department of Justice, seeking all records from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A FOIA request (EOUSA-2019-003550) was submitted on July 1, 2019, by attorneys from Boies Schiller Flexner LLP seeking all records from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

The request seeks comprehensive files including witness statements, reports, photographs, notes, emails, and audio/video materials related to investigations where Epstein or Maxwell were a target, defendant, witness, or complainant.
The request specifically includes records relating to Jeffrey Epstein's address at E. 71st Street, New York, NY 10021-4102.
The law firm agrees to pay reasonable duplication fees up to $500 and requests notification before any costs exceed that amount.
The document indicates a duplicate FOIA request was inadvertently generated under tracking number EOUSA-2019-003551 due to a technical issue with the foiaonline.gov system.
